availableInternally.description: Position is currently open to internals (implies status is active, but callers shuold check that relevant closeDates are in the future)

availableExternally.description: Position is currently open to externals (implies status is active, but callers shuold check that relevant closeDates are in the future)

positionOpeningURI.description: URI of the opening - see HR-XML

applyURI.description: URI of the page where a candidate applies - see HR-XML

closeDate.description: the date on which applications are scheduled to close

internalCloseDate.description: the date on which applications from internal candidates are scheduled to close. If not set, closeDate is used.

externalCloseDate.description: the date on which applications from external candidates are scheduled to close. If not set, closeDate is used.

code.description: A code, often used in advertisements and when referring to the positionOpening with candidates. Codes are expected to be unique within currently active positionOpenings. Not in HR/XML

title.description: A short phrase describing the position as it would be listed on a business card or in a company directory

companyRef.description: as per Salesforce, more explicit than org
